# Summary
Bollinger Bands

## R Libraries
```{r library}
library(quantmod)
library(TTR)
```

## Preparation of data
```{r download data}
tickers <- c("^HSI","^GSPC")
getSymbols(Symbols = tickers,
           src = "yahoo",
           index.class = "POSIXct",
           from = "1997-01-01")
```

## Prepare technical analysis of Bollinger Bands
```{r bollinger bands}
bbands.HLC <- BBands(na.omit(HSI[,c("HSI.High","HSI.Low","HSI.Close")]))
```

## Plot
```{r BBands plot}
plot(bbands.HLC)
plot(bbands.HLC["2020/2022"])
plot(bbands.HLC["2020/2022"][,1:3])
plot(bbands.HLC["2020/2022"][,4])
```
